title: Lease vs. Buy Analysis
description: A customer is undecided between leasing or financing a new car and wants to understand the financial differences.

tasks.description: Gather information on the customer's expected annual mileage and how long they typically keep a car.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent learns the customer drives ~12,000 miles/year and likes a new car every 3 years.

tasks.description: Generate a sample monthly payment for a 36-month lease and a 60-month finance contract for the same vehicle.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates two clear payment scenarios.

tasks.description: Explain the pros and cons of each option based on the customer's habits (e.g., lower payments and no long-term commitment with leasing vs. building equity with financing).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear, unbiased comparison to help the customer make an informed decision.
